# Outlook attachment checker installation guide

= Introduction =

Follow the following steps to install this program.


= Steps =

- Download the oac.zip file and unzip it.

- Copy the file extracted to %APPDATA%\Microsoft\Outlook folder.

- Start Outlook.

- Go to "Tools->Macros->Macros..."

- When the security dialog box pops up, choose always believe the publisher and enable the macro.

- You are ready to use it.
